title: Old Clip of Prez on Death Penalty for Raping Minors Misleads Many
subtitle: Fact Check of a video of President Ram Nath Kovind in which he can be heard saying that the government has decided to give death penalty to rapists and this decision has sent a strong message across all the states in India.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The video which is doing the rounds is misleading. While the video hasn’t been doctored in any manner, it has been edited to put the president’s statement out of context.

Firstly, it is not a recent statement. It was made on 31 January 2019. Secondly, the video clip is from President Kovind’s address to both the Houses of the Parliament ahead of the last session of the 16th Lok Sabha which commenced on 31 January. Enlisting the work done by the Modi government in its first tenure, Kovind had said that the government made a provision for capital punishment in case of rape of minors.

Kovind can be heard making the same statement at around 17 minutes in the video.
